import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Image, Card, Icon, Label, Button } from "semantic-ui-react"; class Cards extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props) const data=this.props; console.log(data.buttons[1]) return (
{data.meta} {data.description} {Object.entries(data.buttons).map((k, v) => { console.log(k[1]) return }) }
); } } export default Cards;
